Title: Enacts "Francesco's law"; repealer
Summary: Enacts "Francesco's law" which establishes violations for the failure to safely store rifles, shotguns, and firearms in the presence of a minor or a prohibited person; repeals certain provisions relating thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enacting "Francesco's law"; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions of the penal law relating to safely storing rifles, shotguns, and firearms
